features: Easy Setup: Simply insert the nano USB receiver (stored inside at the back of the keyboard) into your computer and use the keyboard instantly.
Ergonomic design: Scissors X structure gives you the comfortable typing experience, low-profile keys offer quiet and comfortable typing.
Long Battery Life: Energy-saving design and automatic sleep mode allow up to 4 months between battery changes. (based on 2 hours' non-stop use per day) (2 X AAA batteries included)
Ultra Thin and Light: Compact size (11.12 X 4.7 X 0.2in) and light weight (7.65oz) but provides full size keys, shortcuts for comfortable typing.
Package contents: Arteck HW098 USB Wireless Keyboard, nano USB receiver, 2 X AAA batteries, welcome guide, our 24-month warranty and friendly customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specifications: Wireless Edition: 2.4G USB Wireless Dimensions: 285 x 120 x 6 mm / 11.2 x 4.7 x 0.2 inch Buttons: 78 keys (including 12 hot keys) Weight: 217g / 7.65 oz Operating Range: Up to 10 meters / 33 feet The keyboard is made of superior plastic. Easy Setup and Use Just simply insert the nano USB receiver into your computer like desktop or laptop, then the keyboard can be used instantly. No need driver. The Keyboard will work up to 33 feet or 10 meters. It allows you to gain quick access to common functions, such as volume level, playback control, brightness, and more. Comfortable, quiet typing The whisper-quiet, low-profile keys bring a whole new level of comfort to your fingertips. What's more, keep all your most-used functions and media controls closer than ever Windows-dedicated hot keys. The construction of this scissors-kick keys can be used more than 3 million times continuously. Long Battery Life Energy-saving design and automatic sleep mode allow up to 4 months between battery changes. (based on 2 hours' non-stop use per day) (2 X AAA batteries included) Note: This keyboard will automatically go into power saving sleep mode after 30 mins of inactivity. Press any key and wait 2-3 seconds to wake the keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent keyboard for a great price
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard. It works great, and it fits perfect in a small place. It’s also quite easy to type with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So compact and tiny! Need it cause my keyboard for my school computer died (for the second time in 1 year) and insurance won't cover it being replaced ($50!!). This keyboard is perfect for my needs! So compact and portable, easy to assemble and get right to typing! I even got the used one and it was great! Would buy again or recommend to anyone!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good little keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Good keyboard overall. Pretty small, just like I wanted it, takes some getting used to after using one with a number pad on the right. Came with 2 batteries and the dongle of course. Only major downside for me is that the ON/OFF switch is located UNDER the keyboard (see pic), requiring me to have to feel for it/look for it. Takes a few seconds, so not a big deal. I just feel like it's be better for it to be located directly behind the keyboard and have a better design for switching it off and on. Red light comes on for just a few seconds to indicate power then turns off. The sides of the keyboard feel a little sharp, giving it a cheap feel. It's super lightweight and the clacking of the keyboard isn't too loud for me personally.I have bought a mouse and dongle from ARTECK before and honestly expected keyboard that was just as smooth and well thought out as the mouse I have from them. This product feels a little ways away from perfection but I'm sure with some minimal design changes, it would be the best keyboard for me. I will keep using it and see if how I feel changes in regards to the switch and overall feel. Still pretty good nonetheless for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flimsy But Effective
reviews.reviewText: It probably weighs less than two grams, and sits at an angle, up in the back, down in the front, so I absolutely wouldn't use it at a desk or as a daily driver, but it works great for a media center PC or a Steam Deck (or other portable PC without a keyboard) that doesn't require frequent keyboard use. The on/off switch is on the bottom, and it's difficult to switch, which is a positive given some of the boards I've used have had on/off switches loosen and stop working over time, which I definitely don't forsee being a problem with this one. Media keys on the F-key row are what you need, and nothing more, which is nice. It's almost exactly the size of a Steam Deck, so it fits perfectly in Deck specific travel bags. Overall, it's a perfect, no-nonsense, low-cost solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a company issues laptop and the keyboard has given me problems from day one. The space only works if I press it on one specific spot and some of the letter keys stick. I have a full-sized corded keyboard I use when I’m home, but when I travel for work it’s not practical to bring the full sized keyboard with me. This wireless keyboard is the perfect size to carry in a backpack but it’s not too small to work with. It comes with a AA battery and a small USB plug. I’ve been using this keyboard for well over a month and it’s still going strong on the battery it came with. It’s a great buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall good, with a small issue
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard has been in use for about a year now and I’ve still not had to replace the batteries even though it gets used for 9 hours a day 5 days a week. Feels comfortable to type in and is nice and compact. It doesn’t take up much room at all. One minor issue is that sometimes the S key will stick and enter in twice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars UPDATE Not for heavy hitters. ( not for anyone, really)
reviews.reviewText: I dont know how to send a pic, but it has 2 broken buttons. the shift key, & the button that is to the left of the #1 key. (`~ ) after 1 slip & drop. in did put the buttons back on, but they fall right back off. even if you glue them, you'll end up gluing the whole thing. LOL very flimsy, probably pretty breakable from children. not drop safe, nor any accident safe. a dog would demolish it. 🤣 it probably would survive a drop test, but only 1. Did NOT survive a drop test. 😉 it works for what I need it for. it's a keeper for me UPDATE. I dont recommend this one for anyone. the only thing i use it for is so i dont have to stand up, lean over my vdrums, to get to my laptop to type things in . puter sits in front of me on a music stand, no where else to put it.i decided to try a portable keyboard, does make my life easier & more comfortable. however, this is not the one. il be buying another, not this one. when i get the the next one, this one goes in the trash. its not even good enough to donate. thats bad. you get what you pay for, but this isnt even worth the few bucks it costs. bummer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small and decently effective
reviews.reviewText: I like the size. It's one of the reasons I got it. I didn't realize that being scaled down means my muscle memory is no longer accurate and so I often find myself mistyping. But again, I got it because it was small so it feels unfair to complain.It also seems to work just fine on a desk but I got a portable one so I can use it on the go, and often have the keyboard on my lap. When I do this, it doesn't seem to register very well, and I need to tip it at an angle before my computer will read it without delays or errors. A stronger signal would be really helpful and add a lot of versatility, since if I wanted to put it on a desk I'd just get a full sized or even wired keyboard.Otherwise it's cute and the battery lasts pretty well. USB-C charging would be cool though.

Ich wollte eine Tastatur, die so klein und handlich ist wie die meines Apple-Rechners. Da ich sie nur hin und wieder an meinem PC zum Spielen benutze, habe ich keine allzu hohen Ansprüche oder Erwartungen. Und tatsächlich wurden meine Erwartungen auch nicht übertroffen.Diese Tastatur hier sieht meiner Mac-Tastatur recht ähnlich. Nun ja, auf den ersten Blick jedenfalls.Gleiche Breite, gleiche Höhe, ähnlich große Tasten. Während ich mit meinem Mac-Brett aber Nägel in die Wand schlagen kann, würde das mit der Tastatur hier nicht wirklich klappen.Sie quietscht und klappert fröhlich vor sich hin, dazu wellt sich die rechte Seite ein wenig nach oben. Ach so, sie lässt sich auch mit ein wenig Druck durchbiegen.Alles keine allzu rosigen Voraussetzungen.Aber: man darf niemals den Preis vergessen. Diese Tastatur kostet keine 20 Euro, die Funkverbindung zum Rechner klappt tadellos und schreiben lässt sich auch sehr gut damit.Benötige ich sie nicht mehr, lässt sich sich in Windeseile in der Schublade verstauen.Ich finde, für den Preis habe ich eine schlechte Verarbeitung bekommen, kann mit der Tastatur aber alles an meinem PC tun, was ich möchte.Nachtrag nach zwei Monaten:Ich benutze diese Tastatur nun seit mehr als zwei Monaten täglich. Bis auf die etwas abenteuerliche Verarbeitung habe ich in dieser Zeit nicht einen Negativpunkt entdecken können. Sie ist zuverlässig, kompakt, weder beim Spielen oder Schreiben ist auch nur ein Tastaturanschlag danebengegangen.Für mich ebenso wichtig ist, dass sie so schön kompakt ist.Wenn man Preis und Leistung betrachtet, dann würde ich sie mir wohl wieder kaufen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Upgrade Your Typing Experience with this Keyboard– The Perfect Blend of Style and Functionality!
reviews.reviewText: As someone who spends a lot of time typing, I know how important it is to have a keyboard that is comfortable, reliable, and easy to use. And that's exactly what you get with the Arteck 2.4G Wireless Keyboard.This keyboard is ultra-slim and compact, making it the perfect choice for anyone who wants to save space without sacrificing comfort or functionality. The keys are responsive and easy to press, and the overall design is sleek and stylish. And with a wireless range of up to 33 feet, you can use this keyboard from anywhere in the room without any lag or delays.But what really sets the Arteck 2.4G Wireless Keyboard apart is its versatility. It works with a wide range of devices, including laptops, desktops, tablets, and smartphones, and it's compatible with both Windows and Mac operating systems. And the long-lasting battery ensures that you can use this keyboard for hours on end without having to worry about running out of power.Overall, I would highly recommend the Arteck 2.4G Wireless Keyboard to anyone looking for a high-quality, reliable, and stylish keyboard that can keep up with their typing needs. It's the perfect blend of form and function, and it's sure to exceed your expectations. So why wait? Upgrade your typing experience with the Arteck 2.4G Wireless Keyboard today!
商品の到着が1日遅れたのですが無事届きました。とりあえずPCのUSBにレシーバーを取り付けキーボードの動作確認しましたが問題なく機能してます。見た目もコンパクトで使い勝手は、良いと思います。後、出品者様からも到着したかの確認のメールまで頂き気配りが良いなと思いました。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard was only supposed to be a temporary solution whilst I looked for a newer more premium, but small keyboard after my last one died. I spend 40 hours a week working with it (WFH) and have quickly gotten used to it, typing on it is decent and the media keys are quite useful for Spotify control while I work.As it uses a dongle (no bluetooth) it connects nicely with my KVM switch, and switching between different machines is seamless.If you're looking at this for either full time or temporary use, it's certainly decent value for money.The only negative I can think of is that it can feel a little flimsy, but at this price point it's not unexpected.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solide Tastatur für Reisen oder Remote Work
reviews.reviewText: Diese Tastatur ist klein und handlich für Reisen und passt in jeden Rucksack oder Laptoptasche. Sie verbindet sich über einen USB Dongle mit dem Computer. Sie ist auf einer Seite leicht erhöht, was ergonomisch ist.Vorteile:- klein und kompakt- stabil- leichtNachteile:- benötigt USB Dongle, kann sich nicht eigenständig via Bluetooth verbinden. Unpraktisch, da neuere Laptops mit immer weniger USB Anschlüssen kommen.- Einige Tasten werden schwerfälliger nach 8 Monaten BenutzungIch benutze die Tastatur weiterhin und würde sie auch weiterempfehlen.
